name: indium rich leaching residues, from zinc production stockpiling | indium rich leaching residues, from zinc production stockpiling | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12720/documentation

Stockpiling is a way of assuring provision and control over supplies, and is systematically applied with some commodities by several countries.;This dataset describes the stockpiling of indium rich leaching residues, from zinc production following zinc production. The stockpiling is considered to happen in the geographical sourroundings of the zinc production.;Sources:;-US Department of defense, 2013, Strategic and Critical Materials - Report on Stockpile Requirements.;-Reconfiguration of the National Defense Stockpile Report to Congress, April 2009.

Activity starts with the arrival of indium rich leaching residues to the stockpile

The activity ends with the provision of the service of stockpiling the indium rich leaching residues.
category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: land occupation is adapted from sulfur storage

Estimation. It is estimated a ground sealing with 50 cm gravel bed, 3 mm plastic geo-sealing sheet and 20 cm of asphalt cover.

The density of asphalt concrete is 2000 kg/m3.(http://www.substech.com/dokuwiki/doku.php?id=thermoplastic_low_density_polyethylene_ldpe)

exchanges.description:
Adapted from steel use in sulfur storage, due to lack of specific data. The amount of steel is estimated from a picture of a typical sulfur storage area (see link below) 


http://www.kwhconstructors.com/services.bulk.maintenance.php?gallery=pacificcoastterminalssulfurstack-rake

There are two main parts containing steel:
- 1 steel structure and conveyor. The estimated dimensions are 25m*2m*2m
- 1 steel track that has the lenght of the storage area. It is assumed a rectangular storage area with dimension of122.5m*40.8 m. The dimensions of the track are 122.5m*2m*1m

flow.name: steel, unalloyed

exchanges.description:
Adapted from storage of sulfur, due to lack of specific data. For sulfur, the data is obtained from a storage project in Port Ridley, Alberta, Canada, 
The planned area for dry bulk sulfur storage is 5,000 m2. 
The max. capacity is 100,000 tonnes.The lifetime of the stockpile is estimated as 70 years. 

It is estimated that the average storage time of 1 kg of lead for stockpiling is 5 years. This is considered a reasonable time period to assure proper storage and retrievability. Thus, after 5 years the stocked material will be retrieved or changed to a new placement, in order to ensure proper access and keep the shafts accessible.

The  transformation is calculated as:

occupation area / lifetime of stockpile

Estimation. It is estimated a ground sealing with 50 cm gravel bed, 3 mm plastic geo-sealing sheet and 20 cm of asphalt cover.

The density of low density polyethylene is 920 kg/m3. (http://www.substech.com/dokuwiki/doku.php?id=thermoplastic_low_density_polyethylene_ldpe)

exchanges.description:
Adapted from storage of sulfur, due to lack of specific data. For sulfur, the data is obtained from a storage project in Port Ridley, Alberta, Canada, 
The planned area for dry bulk sulfur storage is 5,000 m2. 
The max. capacity is 100,000 tonnes.The lifetime of the stockpile is estimated as 70 years. 

It is estimated that the average storage time of 1 kg of lead for stockpiling is 5 years. This is considered a reasonable time period to assure proper storage and retrievability. Thus, after 5 years the stocked material will be retrieved or changed to a new placement, in order to ensure proper access and keep the shafts accessible.

The occupation is calculated:
5 (kg*years) *5000 (m2) *70 years /((100000000 (kg) * 70 (years) )
